TopicTitle: Is Raid Ant&Roach safe for pets?

Articles.Content: Well I have a cat that likes to hang out where the water bugs are to stare at them, I bought a can of Raid ant and roach to kill them. I just wanted to make sure it isn\'t going to harm my cat.

It shouldn\'t be too dangerous, but if you manage to spray it directly at the cat, or if they end up ingesting some, it could have quite nasty effects.

EDIT: It should be fine, the info I was looking at was for much higher concentrations of the same stuff.

Personally, I would spray and try to keep the animals away for a few hours.

But I wouldn\'t treat it as a life/death situation.

Unless Raid has been lacing its products with DDT, you should not have too many problems.

Otherwise, its Borneo all over again.
